channel.title: sheets on deskriders
channel.description: Recent content in sheets on deskriders

item.title: Tracking Stocks in Google Sheet
item.description: Generate CSV reports $ ./generate-csv-reports.sh 2>&1 | grep "Exporting report" Combine all reports $ python3 combine-all-csvs.py Paste into Google Sheet Re-arrange and apply formulas Last Close: =GOOGLEFINANCE(C3,"price") Current Code: =G3*E3 TV Link: =HYPERLINK(CONCATENATE("https://www.tradingview.com/chart/?symbol=", C3), C3) Chart: =sparkline(googlefinance(C3,"price",today()-30,today())) Profit Loss: =I3-H3
